actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT environment,
       COUNT(id) * 100.0 / (
           SELECT COUNT(id)
           FROM wp_edd_all_sites
           WHERE check_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
       ) AS percentage
FROM wp_edd_all_sites
WHERE check_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
GROUP BY environment
ORDER BY percentage DESC;
